sentences.en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
sentences.cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

sentences.en: a second year student
sentences.cn: 二年级学生

sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentences.en: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.cn: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

sentences.en: Can you just lift the table for a second?
sentences.cn: 你把桌子抬起来一下好吗？

sentences.en: Clinton’s second term in office
sentences.cn: 克林顿的第二个任期

sentences.en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentences.cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentences.en: Finding a second wind, he rode away from his pursuers.
sentences.cn: 他缓过劲儿来，骑马逃离了追赶他的人。

sentences.en: He finished second in the championship four years in a row.
sentences.cn: 他连续4年获得锦标赛亚军。

sentences.en: He was over a second faster than his previous best time.
sentences.cn: 他比自己以前的最好成绩快了1秒多。

sentences.en: He would soon launch a second offensive, killing off the peace process.
sentences.cn: 他不久将会再次发动进攻，彻底毁掉整个和平进程。

sentences.en: Her orbital speed must be a few hundred meters per second.
sentences.cn: 其轨道速度一定是在每秒几百米。

sentences.en: his second wife
sentences.cn: 他的第二任妻子

sentences.en: Hold your breath for six seconds.
sentences.cn: 请你屏气6秒钟。

sentences.en: I would creep in and with stealthy footsteps explore the second-floor.
sentences.cn: 我会偷偷溜进去，轻手轻脚地查看一下二楼。

sentences.en: In those crowded streets her attire did not rate a second glance.
sentences.cn: 在那些拥挤的街道她的穿着并未引起注意。

sentences.en: My personal life has had to take second place to my career.
sentences.cn: 我的私人生活不得不让位于事业。

sentences.en: She doubled as the secretary in the first act and the receptionist in the second.
sentences.cn: 她在剧中兼演两角，第一幕中演秘书，第二幕中演招待员。

sentences.en: She won second prize.
sentences.cn: 她赢得了二等奖。

sentences.en: That is the second time you have made that observation.
sentences.cn: 那是你第二次作那样的申述了。

sentences.en: The gun was fired and Beaton was wounded a second time.
sentences.cn: 枪响了，比顿再次受伤。

sentences.en: The operation takes only 30 seconds.
sentences.cn: 这个操作仅需要30秒钟。

sentences.en: the second half of the year
sentences.cn: 下半年

sentences.en: the second of August
sentences.cn: 8月2日

sentences.en: the second time in three days
sentences.cn: 三天中的第二次

sentences.en: the Second World War
sentences.cn: 第二次世界大战

sentences.en: The second-hand version is a poor copy of the original.
sentences.cn: 盗版版本是对原版的低劣复制。

sentences.en: The UN secretary-general seconded the appeal for peace.
sentences.cn: 联合国秘书长支持这项和平呼吁。

sentences.en: This murderous lunatic could kill them both without a second thought.
sentences.cn: 这个杀人狂会不假思索地把他们两个都杀掉。

sentences.en: Ultrasonic waves travel at around 300 metres per second .
sentences.cn: 超声波的传播速度约为每秒300米。

words.tran_cn: 第二的；中等的；次要的；中级的
在其次；在第二，在第二位

phrases.tran_cn: 居第二位的；仅次于最好的
（大学考试成绩）二等；二等舱；二流；（美）二等邮件（定期期刊等）

trans.tran_en: the second person, thing, event etc is the one that comes after the first
used before you add information to what you have already said

trans.tran_cn: 秒，片刻，二等货，二挡，二级优等学位，添菜，(拳击或国际象棋锦标赛的)副手
trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 seconds in a minute.
the one that comes after the first
the second person, thing, event etc is the one that comes after the first
to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting
